DOC.brief_summary: several studies have investigated healing effect of phenytoin.In this study we investigate healing effect of phenytoin mucoadhesive paste comparing to the usual mucoadhesive paste after oral biopsy.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Effect of Phenytoin Mucoadhesive Paste on Wound Healing After Oral Biopsy
DOC.criteria: patients undergone oral biopsy systemic disease
